snippet: Marisa Acocella Marchetto, the cartoonist and graphic novelist, lives with her husband, Silvano Marchetto, the restaurateur, in Greenwich Village.
abstract: New Yorker cartoonist and graphic novelist Marisa Acocella Marchetto loves her Greenwich Village apartment, which sits around corner from her husband's celebrated restaurant Da Silvano, and is tied together by her devotion to color blue.
lead_paragraph: Marisa Acocella Marchetto, the cartoonist and graphic novelist, lives with her husband, Silvano Marchetto, the restaurateur, in Greenwich Village.

headline.print_headline: The Cartoonist in Her Blue Grotto
headline.main: The Cartoonist in Her Blue Grotto
